wikipedia_page.main: Denis Hallinan, DD (b Graigue 14 November 1849; d Limerick 2 July 1923) was an Irish Roman Catholic Bishop in the 20th Century.Keane was educated at The Irish College, Rome and ordained in 1874. After a curacy in Jersey he joined the staff of St Munchin's College. He served in Newcastle West and Limerick. Hallinan was appointed Bishop of Limerick on 10 January 1918. He was consecrated on 2 March that year and died in post.
